title: Person of Interest - John Reese
author: CBS EyeLab
comment: This was the most epic thing ever omg well done
Is John left-handed?  Now that I think about it, every time I see him fire it's with this left hand.
This show deserves a second chance.
I would love to see him back in his own show something like the Equalizer.
description: No one knows his real name.  They call him John Reese, 'the man in the suit.'  To know who Mr. Reese is, you must understand who he was.  Tune in to 'Person of Interest' to see how they prevent crime before it starts Thursdays 9/8c only CBS!
